name: PLEASE READ ME BEFORE RUNNING
info:
Make sure you read and understand the settings in the "Process Configuration" before you run.

Nodes with an * at the end of their name include node-specific information in the Description tab of those nodes.  Please review.

name: Build Node Diagnostic Entities
Build HVAC Devices
func:
// ####################### Begin HVAC Device Configuration #######################
// Home Assistant can use MQTT Discovery to create a HVAC (referred to as a climate entity).
//   https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/climate.mqtt/
// Unlike the other entities, this entity will utilize several different mqtt topics from individual channels
//   to form the Climate entity.
i = msg.thing.UID.replace(/:/g,"_")
i = i.replace("-","_")

discoveryBaseTopic = global.get("mqttDiscoveryTopic") + "/climate/" + msg.thing.hass.UID_ha + "/hvac"
msg.topic = discoveryBaseTopic + "/config"

msg.payload =   {
                "name":                             msg.thing.label,
                "object_id":                        global.get("namePrecursor") + msg.thing.label,
                "unique_id":                        i,
                "enabled_by_default":               "true",
                "availability":                     {   
                                                        "topic":                    msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopic,
                                                        "payload_available":        msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopicOn,
                                            	        "payload_not_available":    msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopicOff,
                                            	        "value_template":           "{{ value_json." + msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopicAttr + " }}", 
                                                    },
                "device": {
                    "manufacturer":                 global.get("manufacturer"),
                    "via_device":                   global.get("via_device"),
                    "identifiers":                  msg.thing.hass.UID_ha,
                    "name":                         msg.thing.hass.label,
                    "model":                        "OneControl: "+ msg.thing.hass.UID_ha,
                    "sw_version":                   "1.0"
                    },
                "action_topic":                     "smarthome/items/"+i+"_status/state",
                "action_template":                  "{{ value_json.value }}",
                "current_temperature_topic":        "smarthome/items/"+i+"_inside_temperature/state",
                "current_temperature_template":     "{{ value_json.value }}",
                "fan_mode_command_topic":           "smarthome/items/"+i+"_fan_mode/set",
                "fan_mode_state_topic":             "smarthome/items/"+i+"_fan_mode/state",
                "fan_mode_state_template":          "{{ value_json.value }}",
                "fan_modes":                        ["auto", 
        	                                            "low", 
        	                                            "high"],
                "hold_command_topic":               "smarthome/items/"+i+"_heat-source/set",
                "hold_state_topic":                 "smarthome/items/"+i+"_heat-source/state",
                "hold_state_template":              "{{ value_json.value }}",
                "hold_modes":                       ["Prefer Heatpump",
                                                        "Prefer Gas"],
        	    "mode_command_topic":               "smarthome/items/"+i+"_hvac_mode/set",
                "mode_state_topic":                 "smarthome/items/"+i+"_hvac_mode/state",
            	"mode_state_template":              "{{ value_json.value }}",
            	"modes":                            ["heat", 
            	                                        "cool",
            	                                        "heat_cool",
            	                                        "off"],
            	"min_temp":                         45,
            	"max_temp":                         100,
            	"precision":                        1,
            	"retain":                           true,
            	"temperature_high_command_topic":   "smarthome/items/"+i+"_high_temperature/set",
            	"temperature_high_state_topic":     "smarthome/items/"+i+"_high_temperature/state",
            	"temperature_high_state_template":  "{{ value_json.value }}",
            	"temperature_low_command_topic":    "smarthome/items/"+i+"_low_temperature/set",
            	"temperature_low_state_topic":      "smarthome/items/"+i+"_low_temperature/state",
            	"temperature_low_state_template":   "{{ value_json.value }}",
            	"temp_step":                        1,
    }
msg.type = "entity"
node.send(msg)

discoveryBaseTopic = global.get("mqttDiscoveryTopic") + "/sensor/" + msg.thing.hass.UID_ha + "/device_mode"
msg.topic = discoveryBaseTopic + "/config"
msg.payload =   {
                "name":                             msg.thing.label + " Device State",
                "object_id":                        global.get("namePrecursor") + msg.thing.label + " Device State",
                "unique_id":                        i + "_device_state",
                "enabled_by_default":               "true",
                "availability":                     {
                                                    	"topic":                    msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopic,
                                                    	"payload_available":        "online",
                                                    	"payload_not_available":    "offline",
                                                    	"value_template":           "{{ value_json.status }}", 
                                                    },
                "device": {
                    "manufacturer":                 global.get("manufacturer"),
                    "via_device":                   global.get("via_device"),
                    "identifiers":                  msg.thing.hass.UID_ha,
                    "name":                         msg.thing.hass.label,
                    "model":                        "OneControl: "+ msg.thing.hass.UID_ha,
                    "sw_version":                   "1.0"
                    },
                "entity_category":                  "diagnostic",
                "state_topic":                     "smarthome/items/"+i+"_status/state",
                "value_template":                  "{{ value_json.value }}"
}
msg.type = "entity"
node.send(msg)

discoveryBaseTopic = global.get("mqttDiscoveryTopic") + "/select/" + msg.thing.hass.UID_ha + "/device_mode"
msg.topic = discoveryBaseTopic + "/config"
msg.payload =   {
                "name":                             msg.thing.label + " Heat Source Select",
                "object_id":                        global.get("namePrecursor") + msg.thing.label + " Heat Source Select",
                "unique_id":                        i + "_heat_source_select",
                "enabled_by_default":               "true",
                "availability":                     {
                                                    	"topic":                    msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopic,
                                                    	"payload_available":        "online",
                                                    	"payload_not_available":    "offline",
                                                    	"value_template":           "{{ value_json.status }}", 
                                                    },
                "device": {
                    "manufacturer":                 global.get("manufacturer"),
                    "via_device":                   global.get("via_device"),
                    "identifiers":                  msg.thing.hass.UID_ha,
                    "name":                         msg.thing.hass.label,
                    "model":                        "OneControl: "+ msg.thing.hass.UID_ha,
                    "sw_version":                   "1.0"
                    },
                "entity_category":                  "diagnostic",
                "state_topic":                      "smarthome/items/"+i+"_heat-source/state",
                "command_topic":                    "smarthome/items/"+i+"_heat-source/set",
                "options":                          [
                                                        "Prefer Heatpump", 
            	                                        "Prefer Gas"
            	                                    ],
}
msg.type = "entity"
node.send(msg)

name: Pre-Process Individual Channels
Process Individual Channels
Custom Sensors and Tools
func:
// ####################### Begin Online Status Details sensor #######################
// OneControl provides additional information in the availability messages published, and this informaion
//   is very useful in diagnosing potential connection issues.
// This sensor displays any additional status details if there are any to report
msg1 = {}
name = msg.thing.label + " Online Status Details"
property = "online_status_details"
baseTopic  =  global.get("mqttDiscoveryTopic") + "/sensor/" + msg.thing.hass.UID_ha + "/" + property
msg1.topic =  baseTopic + "/config"

msg1.payload = {
    "name":                 name,
    "object_id":            global.get("namePrecursor") + name,
    "unique_id":            msg.thing.hass.UID_ha + " " + property,
    "entity_category":      "diagnostic",
    "state_topic":          msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopic,
    "value_template":       "{{ value_json.statusDetail }}",
    "availability":         {"topic":                      msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopic,
                            	"payload_available":        msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopicOn,
                            	"payload_not_available":    msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopicOff,
                            	"value_template":           "{{ value_json." + msg.thing.hass.availabilityTopicAttr + " }}", 
                                },
    "device":                {"manufacturer":       global.get("manufacturer"), 
                                "via_device":       global.get("via_device"),
                                "identifiers":      msg.thing.hass.UID_ha, 
                                "name":             msg.thing.label, 
                                "model":            global.get("model") + ": " + msg.thing.hass.UID_ha,
                                "sw_version":       global.get("sw_version")
                                },
    "enabled_by_default":   true
    } 
msg1.type = "entity"
node.send(msg1)
// ####################### End Online Status Details sensor #######################

return[null,msg]

name: Value Cleanup
Process Configuration
Enable to see errors in the Degub pane
JSON Filename
func:
msg.filename = msg.filename +".json"
return msg;

name: File Options
YAML Filename
func:
msg.filename = msg.filename +".yaml"
return msg;

name: MQTT Options
Normalize Node Records
func:
var msg1 = {}

msg1.payload = {}
/* Loop through incoming payload to rename the individual things so they can be better processed later */

for (var i = 0; i < msg.payload.length; i++) {
    var thing = {}
    
    thingTypeUID = msg.payload[i].thingTypeUID.replace("idsmyrv:","")
    thingTypeUID = thingTypeUID.replace("-thing","")
    
    thingUID = msg.payload[i].UID.replace("-thing:","_")
    thingUID = thingUID.replace("idsmyrv:","")
    thingUID = thingUID.replace(/:/g,"_")
    thingUID = thingUID.replace(/-/g,"_")
    
    /*
    // This uses the _online channel as source of availability
    availTopic =        msg.payload[i].UID.replace(/:/g,"_")
    availTopic =        availTopic.replace(/-/g,"_") + "_online"
    availTopic =        "smarthome/items/" + availTopic + "/state"
    availTopicOn =      "on"
    availTopicOff =     "off"
    availAttr =         "value"
    */
    
    // This uses the device online state for availability
    availTopic =        "smarthome/things/" + msg.payload[i].UID + "/status"
    availTopicOn =      "online"
    availTopicOff =     "offline"
    availAttr =         "status"
    
    
    label = msg.payload[i].label.replace(" Thing","")
    label = label.replace("OneControl ","")

    //thing.hass = {}
    msg1.thing  =                   msg.payload[i]
    msg1.thing.hass =                {"label":                  label,
                                    "thingConfig_OC":           msg.payload[i].configuration,
                                    "UID_oc":                   msg.payload[i].UID,
                                    "UID_ha":                   thingUID,
                                    "thingTypeUID_oc":          msg.payload[i].thingTypeUID,
                                    "thingTypeUID_ha":          thingTypeUID,
                                    "thingChannelCount":        msg.payload[i].channels.length,
                                    "availabilityTopic":        availTopic,
                                    "availabilityTopicOn":      availTopicOn,
                                    "availabilityTopicOff":     availTopicOff,
                                    "availabilityTopicAttr":    availAttr,
                                    "stateTopic":               global.get("mqttDiscoveryTopic") +"/binary_sensor/" + thingUID + "/status"
                                }
    
    msg1.payload = msg.payload[i].channels
    /* Send each thing record as a new message to split up the array and process the things individually */
    
    node.send(msg1)
}

name: Set Initial Availability (If enabled)
Build State URL
Process Results
Block Repeat Messages
func: rbe

name: Format Inbound Message
This section connects to the OneControl system and pulls down event and state change info and writes it to MQTT
Data Format Conversions *
info: This node is used to translate between the two platforms.  In come cases, values need to be in upper case, some lower case, and some different vlaues entirely.

name: Raw Data Format Conversions *
info:
This node is used to round decimal values down to reasonable sizes to minimize the number of state changes as well as 
the number of MQTT messages that need to be processed.  It is also used to force certain values to lowercase which is needed for compatibility with Home Assistance

name: Format Outbound Message
Outbound Data Format Conversions *
info: This node is used to translate between the two platforms.  In come cases, values need to be in upper case, some lower case, and some different vlaues entirely.

name: Is Event Stream enabled?
This section connects to the local MQTT server and converts messages to commands and updates to OneControl
Is Event Send enabled?
This group will export your OneControl nodes to a local JSON file
